language.l1052: Koj muaj peev xwm sau barcodes raws li koj xav tau kev pab
language.l1056: Los hloov lossis rho tawm, ob-nias ntawm tus xov tooj daim ntawv qhia.

language.l1171: Siv no module nrog heev kom zoo zoo. Yog hais tias lub database yog pib dua, ces yav dhau los cov ntaub ntawv yuav tsis tsum zoo tu qab tso anyhow.

language.l1192: Cov ntaub ntawv tau raug tshem ntse.
language.l1194: Cov khoom no twb tau ntxiv rau lub Tshuag.
